CtF (Capture the Flag)
%% Players randomly divided into two teams - red and blue.%% The award winning team players receive. Purpose - capture the flag opponents, and bring it to their base.%% In case of death, players are automatically resurrected at its base, after 10 seconds.%% Event held in the Coliseum. You may use any items. Buffs before the fight can not be removed.%% Given 3 minutes to register, 1 minute at teleportation, 5 minutes for fighting.%% If the winner is determined before the battle ends automatically.%% At the end of the opening event, all participants resurrected, cured, and teleport back.%% In case of death, the experience is not lost. To register in the opening event, you can use the link (Event must be active): Sign up for Event%% The rules for participation.%%
